website_summaries.verdict: A multi-purpose tool that's lightweight and comes at a reasonable price – impressive functions with few issues.
pros: In addition to offering standard features, it stands out for its built-in LED flashlight and bottle opener
cons: Doesn't have a cap, but this is a minor fault considering all it has to offer

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable shipping time, easy to track and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I got this pen to use it for Standard Field Sobriety Tests. It's a solid pen and worked great but the light only lasted 2 days. I was conducting an SFST while on duty and it happened to rain. After that night the light stopped working. I changed that batteries to new ones. Still doesn't work. Contacted the makers of the pen they responded once then never heard back from them again. I just asked if they sold parts for it. Pen is solid and works but light lasted maybe a day. Just wasnt up for the challenge.
customer_reviews.author: bobby

customer_reviews.title: No stars given at all had to put 1 star just to post
customer_reviews.text: Just received my takeflight tactical self defense pen was so excited to receive this pen due to the fact I am a 911 first responder.. As you can see in my pictures it came in as it is advertised but for a $30 pen not worth it my flashlight does not work and the pen is a twist pen to open and close when I twisted the pen to open it popped apart and does not want to assemble again it’s a defective pen I am very upset about it never again got my money back!!!!
customer_reviews.author: King Guelz

customer_reviews.title: Boost in confidence
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before deciding on this affordable Tactical Pen. I'm glad I chose this one! It exceeded my expectations. It's sturdy, well built, has a nice weight, writes beautifully, and fits well in my small adult hand. I wanted something I could legally and easily carry with me. Daytime crime is up where I live, and I don't wish to be a victim. I like not having a cap to loose. It's easy to twist the pen for the ink and it locks into position. The LED light is very bright. I really like that this pen came with extra ink and an extra battery for the LED light.
customer_reviews.author: C. H.

customer_reviews.title: This pen is awesome. I am a private pilot and really like ...
customer_reviews.text: This pen is awesome. I am a private pilot and really like that I haven't lost it in the cockpit yet. It feels very sturdy (all aluminum body) and the best part is there is an LED light on the end. I normally wear a headlamp at night but I prefer to use the LED on the pen when it's just a quick look at something - especially the tachometer which someone installed under the instrument panel. At this price point all of my friends and family are getting them as Christmas gifts. Great addition to my flight bag. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C Thomas

customer_reviews.title: And it writes too!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tactical pen for my daughter, she attends college and her school limits the types of weapons students may carry on campus. The led light is handy when she is walking to her car at night and the pen is a more substantial self defense weapon than just carrying her keys in her hand. The pen is made of sturdy aluminum and has a strong clip to keep it from being lost. It shipped promptly and came in a nice box, suitable for wrapping if giving as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: callitlikeiseeit

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tactical pen
customer_reviews.text: This gem is solid, writes well, has an amazing flashlight (for its size), and would easily double as a weapon should the need arise. I had no issues taking it through the TSA security checks at the airport. My only niggle is that the pen tip is exactly that, and not a true glass breaking tip. BUT: it's a pen, and serves other functions too.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Myers

customer_reviews.title: I do like it
customer_reviews.text: Writes smooth and the light is bright enough for my needs. I had ordered other pens with lights on them and they ALL have 1 fatal flaw. The cap does not fit to the top of the pen. This is a twist pen and that's great. Only one issue soo far that I can think of. The pen really has no grip, so when it gets wet, it's hard to keep your grip. Your hand just slides down the pen. Add some kind of stippling to give it more grip and it would be awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Know the truth

customer_reviews.title: Update to an earlier review.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome customer service! On an earlier review I gave it 3 stars. I loved the pen but it broke when I was changing the batteries. I wrote it off as no big deal as I had purchased a few others from them and they were fine. I never contacted Takeflight but they emailed me, apologized for the issue and sent me a replacement. Based on the pens themselves I would have purchased more anyway...considering they took care of a problem without prompt, I definitely will and also recommend them to others. THANK YOU TAKEFLIGHT!
customer_reviews.author: Codeman

customer_reviews.title: Solid Pen!
customer_reviews.text: One of the most solid pens I've had so far! Decent light, twist function for the pen so it's unlikely to open in your pocket, and all metal; might be able to use as a makeshift kubotan in a pinch. Only issue I've had is accidentally turning the light on in my pocket despite the heavy push action of it, though this is more user error. Even includes a replacement battery and ink needle (what the hell is that called again?) for the pen function. Satisfied with it over all!
customer_reviews.author: Bacon Maldito

customer_reviews.title: Now I'm prepared even at the office!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a survivalist, and I really appreciate the quality and versatility of this tactical tool. It is helped complete my bug out bag, and I am very happy with this purchase. Is very well-made, useful in many different situations , And the pen writes very nicely! Five stars would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Boombastic

customer_reviews.title: Practical and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This tactical pen self defense tool has been just right for my needs while working in the medical field. Needless to say I did not get it as a tactical weapon. Actually I am not sure I would even have to strength to slug anyone so I can't talk about that aspect. What I needed was a good pen that no one would mistake as theirs, a pen that writes under extreme circumstances including above my head or angled up. I needed a penlight that was dependable and so far so good. They say it breaks glass. To be honest, I hope that is something I never need to check out.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Practical Pens
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased two Tactical pens as a gift for my brother’s birthday. I was satisfied with delivery, but one of the pens arrived damaged/ mishandled. I’d contacted the owner, they responded promptly to this issue and addressed it by resending another order in return of the damaged pen. I’m very satisfied with the professionalism, excellent customer service. My brother loves these tactical pens also. He loves the lightweight feel, smooth grip, practical for writing, and the protection defense use. Bought one in black, other in Red. He uses these pens all day, everyday. I’m relieved. Useful gift my brother actually loves. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a Great Pen
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to use this in my every day life as I use a pen quite frequently and would have liked the tactical advantage this gave. It is, however, not a good pen. Both of the ink cartridges included in the purchase died on me within one day of writing with them. It's cool to have a flashlight/window breaker handy but if I pay for and expect a pen, I should get a good pen!
customer_reviews.author: EgoAtlas

customer_reviews.title: The Best Tool Available!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome tool. Not just a great writing utensil, but TOOL. It's sturdy and handy to have around. I can't even leave it in my car, I love the way it writes too much! Incredibly smooth and the perfect weight while writing. The light is great and shockingly bright, I was pleasantly surprised by that. Thank you for a great tool! I can't wait to see what you guys come up with next!
customer_reviews.author: Lorey

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Pen, 2nd one I've  purchased
customer_reviews.text: I liked the pen enough to buy another one. It's a LARGE pen so keep that in mind, and I really like it however the only down side is that the light seems to get turned on accidentally and kills the battery life, hence the four stars rather than five. This may or may not be an issue depending on how your pen is carried, for me I feel the light switch could be a tad bit more protected to stop this problem. Still, an excellent pen for every day carry, buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Purple

customer_reviews.title: Great pen, flashlight and defense mechanism
customer_reviews.text: Love this pen. As a "left handed" person its hard to find a pen that I love and doesn't leave marks on my palm. I also love that this pen comes equipped with a flashlight. The flashlight is sooo bright and it has an easy "on off function" with the click of a button. It comes with extra batteries and an ink cartridge! The end of the pen would easily make as a defense mechanism. Sharp enough to break put a window, ywt use against an assailant Love that it arrives with a box that can be easily wrapped as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: jayson johnson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy tactical pen for hunting/camping etc.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for Father’s Day. It’s nice and sturdy and well made. He is always adding cool pens to his desk pen cup ie: golf club shaped pens, shock pens, alma mater etc. So I thought this would be a great addition since he loves hunting/camping. Really nice, Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: An awesome EDC addition
customer_reviews.text: I received two Take Flight pens as gifts and I liked them so much that I bought this one as a gift for my uncle. I own two different models but have used this one the most. The light is steady and bright and easy to use and the pen writes smoothly. I haven’t used the pen for anything else so far but based on the quality I believe it would do well in a personal defense situation. The packaging was professional and nice looking and this model came with an ink refill and a spare battery.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Varney

customer_reviews.title: This pen means business
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty pen. It's a thick, heavy pen. Cool that it came with an extra battery and ink replacement. Writes smooth. I like that it's a twist pen so it doesn't accidentally open up in my purse. The light on the top is pretty bright for such a tiny light. Around the light is jagged, not to the point where it would tear up the inside of a pocket or purse but in a self defense situation it would definitely ruin someone's night. Overall, I'm pleased with this pen.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely Ladii

customer_reviews.title: Writes fine, flashlight sucks.
customer_reviews.text: This is my daily carry at work. I'm a firearms instructor, dealer, and armorer. It writes great, is sturdy enough to use for self-defense, but the flashlight absolutely sucks. The button is in an awkward place where you can accidentally turn it on, and mine flashes or doesn't stay on. You're better off just carrying a good metal pen, and a seperate flashlight. But to be fair... It's super cheap so I didn't expect much.
customer_reviews.author: Operator

customer_reviews.title: Defective and used
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift which would have been great if it actually worked. I received my package within the time promised, however it was never new. The ink was dry with no plastic cover over the tip of the pen to show that it was a new refill. The “extra” refill was not only clearly used but dry and dull from being handled so much. The light never came on. The batteries were dead and even the replacement batteries didn’t work. How horrible to have received what I hoped to be a gift and got someone’s return instead.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Shell

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I am a casino security officer in a small town, and a writer of ficton. “The pen is mightier than the sword” is right. Carrying this in my uniform shirt and when I’m out and about makes me feel safer. Highly recommended, along with looking up kobutan self defense videos so you know how to use it (or classes). It is well built with a flesh catcher and flashlight at the end to get you home safe on a dark night.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hubby wanted this for a long time
customer_reviews.text: First of all, my husband has nagged me about this light, my hubby has so many flash lights I was hesitant about buying him another one, but its Christmas, where wishes come true .....so I broke down and bought it ...I did look at this and love the brightness of this flashlight and I know he will love it
customer_reviews.author: STEELTOWNGIRLPA

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase but low ink
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive this pen and I was not disappointed... Well, a little. The material is good, the design is nice and I really like the weight of the pen. The ink was the only disappointment. It ran out after 3 days of sporadic use. Used it in my journal and got only about 3 1/2 pages before it ran out. Easy to get another refill for sure since it's a common refill but for $12 I expected it to write more. Recommend this product but might need a refill soon.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ray

customer_reviews.title: extremely well made
customer_reviews.text: First let me say,I forgot I had this in my pocket when I did the laundry.I took my pants out and threw them in the dryer.I heard something banging around in the dryer.After 20 minutes I opened the dryer and found my tactical pen tangled up in my clothes.I thought it was ruined.I swear not only did the light work,so did the pen,The heat of the dryer should have destroyed that pen but it didn't.No water got inside of it either.I am still amazed.Great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well but needs stronger clip
customer_reviews.text: Love the pen and all of its functions but the clip is a bit wimpy. I keep my pens in back or side pant pockets and the pen needs to hang on tight which this one does not. Also considering the price, I can't afford to lose them.
customer_reviews.author: scotte

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pen for my husband for Valentine’s Day. He is in the Marines and also works at a civilian job at a machine shop. I had received a tactical pen as a gift and he was very jealous lol! He wanted one as well, just a little more masculine (mine was purple). He was very pleased with this gift and has taken it with him to work and already is considering purchasing a second. Thank you for providing such a high quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an anniversary gift for my husband who is a first responder and officer. It lasted roughly 2 weeks after he received it. The pen itself has a nice weight and seems well constructed. However, the light went out almost right away, doesn't work at all. The ink lasted 2 weeks and after changing the refill it no longer closes.
customer_reviews.author: Ktzier

customer_reviews.title: Perfec for present
customer_reviews.text: This tactical pen works really well, the flash light is a plus, the only thing that I find was a con was the paint job, on this pen make it looks cheap. The vendor send this item on time and on a really goos package.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Salais

customer_reviews.title: On/off button failed
customer_reviews.text: At first I absolutely loved this pen. But one day, the flashlight wouldn’t turn off and on with the on/off button. I’m so disappointed. Now I have to unscrew it and screw it back in to control the light. So I’m about to throw it away and get a different brand of tactical pen light. I can’t find a customer service contact for this company anywhere, so this is my only recourse. If someone reaches out to me to fix it or replace the head...I’ll consider changing my review. But as of right now...not good!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa D. Ingalls

customer_reviews.title: Nice pen...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband. It's made from steel and has a little weight to it. It comes in a nice box and has an extra battery (for the flashlight) and an extra ink pen. Fortunately, we haven't had to break any windows with it, but I'm sure it will do the job if the situation arises. I like it too, so I'm going to buy another one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: JennB

customer_reviews.title: Now this is a pen!
customer_reviews.text: How did I not know about these tactical pens until now?! I'm liking this pen/flashlight. Great for EDC. Don't look into the light when you turn on the flashlight; it's surprisingly very bright for such a small item that can fit in your pocket! It writes well, too, decent grip. I'm so impressed with this, I'm going to check out and see what else TakeFlight has to add to my arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: S.W.I.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This particular pen has an LED tip that comes in great at work. It is solid and heavy as I expected. I am sending one to my son who is Army Airborne and studying to be an EMT. I’m sure he will love it as well. Thanks for a great product Matthew and company. Val
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed tactical pen!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this pen for a few days now and I really like how well it is made. I use the flashlight to see circuit breaker panels and wire hook-ups within the aircraft. The pen works well too. The fact that it uses ordinary refill cartridges is a plus. I especially like the pocket clip. It sits high enough that I can clip it in my pants pocket and not have to worry about the clip breaking and the pen slipping out.
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: Made in China not the US
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift so I can’t speak to it’s quality, but it says it’s made by a trusted US company and when I received the item it had a made in China sticker on the back of it. That alone makes me question the truthfulness of anything else mentioned in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Sweigart

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my Dad. He loves the weight and feel of the pen. The light on the pen very bright and will come in very handy. I may buy another one for myself. This company is family run and a veteran-owned business. Thank you for keeping us free.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Surprised at how bright the flashlight is...excellent at night to light up the area. Pen is great quality with smooth flowing ink. Also added is an extra ink cartridge and battery.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Hawkins (Hawk)

customer_reviews.title: So handy for truck drivers!
customer_reviews.text: My husband, who is really difficult to buy for, received one of these as a gift. He is a truck driver and LOVES it! He always needs a pen to sign the trucking paperwork but then can use the super-bright flashlight to inspect trailers, and have it conveniently handy because it clips securely to his pants pocket. He accidentally left it at a customer location and was really unhappy with himself, so I ordered this exact replacement from TakeFlight,Inc. through Amazon. It arrived next day and he is once again happy to have this great multi-tool.
customer_reviews.author: plst

customer_reviews.title: I was tickled to receive it!
customer_reviews.text: i have really needed some quality pens, and an actual pen light makes it even better. I have not yet decided if it is too bright to check pupils, but throats need the extra brightness. My only teensy complaint is that it is a bit heavy for my pockets, which is not a dealbreaker.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: First impressions: Not that heavy but a bit bulky though. Battery and pen cartridge were already installed and easy to give away. Customer loved it especially the flash light. Big positive was that it was 6" long and can be placed in the front pocket if desired.
customer_reviews.author: Mnl4jc

customer_reviews.title: Made in China crap. Buy American or Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening, I immediately removed the rear light assembly to check the battery type and thread quality... A quick indicator of poor made in China manufacturing. This looks and feels like real deal but is nothing more than aade in China knock off not worth $3 at a street vendor in Beijing. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas S

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved this pen today and I have to say upon opening it and holding it, I definitely like the wuben tactical pen much better. The pen doesnt feel good in my hand and is awkward to hold, the use the pen you must twist the end, no biggie, but to close it you twist and then have to must the pen head inside. The light sticks above the DNA/glass breaker, so I see it not lasting long if needed, plus the bulb was already bent to one side. The only plus I could find is the clip, its tight and wont fall out or off whatever it's on. Over all I'd go back to the WUBEN Tactical flashlight pen.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Tactical Pen Multitool Pen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for a friend and he LOVES it. He played around with this pen for 20 mins (with my husband looking on) after opening it. I liked it so well, I ordered another one as a Christmas gift. Great buy !!!!
customer_reviews.author: TMAC TexasTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and functional
customer_reviews.text: I received the tactical pen with LED light in in the time specified. The tactical pen is as described. I love it. I have never seen a pen like this one. It is very functional. The LED is bright. The ink pen part is great and if you had to do some damage with it there should not be a problem. I also think it’s great when a fellow veteran makes a great product. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: David L. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Nice pen
customer_reviews.text: Was not even looking for this, but I came across it. It's a really nice, heavy pen. It was a Christmas gift for my son. He loves nice pens & this definitely is a solid pen. The extras it has is a bonus! It was delivered quickly and packaged nicely & had extra battery & ink included. The light is super bright!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Flashlight feature makes it a perfect pen!
customer_reviews.text: I love tactical pens but this one is my favorite because of the flash light feature and the build quality. And I can always change the jotter refills to change the ink or to switch to a fine ballpoint.
customer_reviews.author: raka

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I've been carrying this at work and really like it. Very sturdy. I haven't tried, but because the tip is not pointed I dont anticipate any issues taking it on a plane. I would just put it in my carry on for security.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of a tactical pen with flashlight, but the flashlight keeps dying. No matter how many times I put new batteries in, they just do not last more than a few days. Additionally, the stylus on the pain did not last more than a few weeks. Look elsewhere to buy a tactical pen.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: My first purchase of a tactical pen and WOW!!! It is heavy duty and the pen writes very smoothly!!! The light is super easy to use and is very bright!!! And it came in a beautiful gift box with an extra ink refill!!! I decided to gift it to my Son-in-Law who is a Police Officer and he can’t say enough about it!!!! He especially likes the weight of it!!!
customer_reviews.author: momalee

customer_reviews.title: Last pen you will ever need
customer_reviews.text: Great pen and I get a lot of comments and compliments on this pen. Uses standard Parker refills, (Amazon) and the batteries for flashlight are easy to find, (Amazon). Use the pen at work and the flashlight comes in really handy as I work on equipment all day.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Weiland

customer_reviews.title: Love this pen
customer_reviews.text: The pen is actually bigger than I thought it would be, pen fits well in my big hand. String metal construction makes it very durable and easy to disinfect. Pen writes surprisingly smooth. Penlight works well and is not too bright to use while assessing pupils.
customer_reviews.author: loki75

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: As a nurse I use this all the time and carry it with me all the time. I use the light to check pupils and I carry it with me for protection since I work on the streets of major urban areas.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Love

customer_reviews.title: American craftsman quality.
customer_reviews.text: As a first responder, having a great pen is key. I am extremely satisfied with this product. The pen is light weight but has a sturdy and is tough. I will recommend this to all of my coworkers. And I will purchase this again for myself.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: as a tactical pen, if you use it, it will cut a hole in your thumb
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great value with amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: The pen is very reasonably priced and the customer service is second to none. My pen developed some sort defect that caused it to spin in place without the ink portion coming off. One email to the seller and replacement was sent to me with no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: dallas elmore

customer_reviews.title: This pen is AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I work in corrections and have always wanted one of these pens for work. My favorite things about this pen is how smooth it writes, how sturdy it fits in my hand and how bright the light is. It is perfect for searches. Also not to mention I love that it came with ink refills and a second battery for the light. This is the perfect present as well. My boyfriend who is also corrections loved his and uses his daily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic pen from a top-rate seller!
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't have time to write product reviews, but I am so happy with this purchase I had to. This is a great quality pen that is esthetically pleasing as well. I'm glad I bought this pen and will be buying more to give out as gifts. If you buy, only buy from Take Flight/So Cal Merchants (for this pen or any tactical gear). Great Amazon seller. Trustworthy and fairly priced. There are far too many vendors on Amazon who are not worthy to buy from. Stick to trusted vendors like Takr Flight/So Cal Merchants.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Original battery doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. Luckily it was for my brother because the battery for the light didn't work. Once the battery was replaced the light worked great. Pen is not too heavy and writes great. It seems they send an extra battery because they know the one inside is dead.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift for a soldier!
customer_reviews.text: A nice well made item. Adopted a soldier that has been deployed and has no family back home. We send items to our men and women when we can and this fit the bill. Being ex military and deployed into places that was not good and not fun anything that let me know that someone back home was thinking of me made all the difference in the world. I think this will be useful and something that will last to have a good memory of a bad time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Serious Flaw
customer_reviews.text: Product fell out of pocket and just fell apart could no longer put it back together very unhappy with the outcome glad I didn’t have to relay on it in a dangerous situation
customer_reviews.author: Sarge

customer_reviews.title: Does its job.
customer_reviews.text: So I've had the pen light for a couple of days now. Writes like a charm. light is nice and bright. feels good in the hand. its taken some hits and no change in any of the features. its definitely a quality item. wish i had read the product page more carefully and bought one with the glass breaker. oh well, still a great item.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend Really Likes it- Would Reccomend
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend works as a teacher in a not-so-safe area, so I decided to get him this pen as an early Christmas present. And when he locks up in the evening, he feels safer, knowing he has this on him and can deter being in harm's way.
customer_reviews.author: Ezelia

customer_reviews.title: Best EDC pen I own!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second or third order of this pen. Gave the first away and TSA decided to hold onto the second (lesson learned). This pen is a little more expensive than some of the others but worth it after checking out some of the junk being sold. Writes great & feels great in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jesseop

customer_reviews.title: Light does not work.
customer_reviews.text: The pen light did not work no matter how many times I changed batteries. It was a gift and it did not work as described. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Btrfly0877

customer_reviews.title: ... have ordered three Tactical Pens and have been very pleased with the quality of the materials used
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered three Tactical Pens and have been very pleased with the quality of the materials used. The light is very bright for such a small diameter. Make sure you look at everything TakeFlight is offerring when you view your EDC. WIsh list. One pen has just the light but further shopping will reveal another similar looking pen that also offers a can opener, and a small razor also.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Love it would like to try more items from this company
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pen for part of my edc and work pen and having it fir about a week I have had no issues with the pen the light works great and is perfect for small rooms and inside cars but I wouldnt us it as a primary light. The pen itself is great writes smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: ... must grip a pen too tight because I felt like it was going to pop out of fingers a ...
